select.if: SELECT T.ID AS "id",'-1' AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.ORGLEVEL = '1'
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'false' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}

mapper.select: SELECT T.CHANL_TYPE_CODE, T.CHANL_TYPE_NAME FROM PTEMP.TB_TEMP_JCDY_CHANL_TYPE T

SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1,T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T.UNIT_NAME,T.HQ_CHAN_CODE,T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,T2.CHNL_TYPE, TO_CHAR(T2.RATIO, 'fm9999999990.0000') AS RATIO, TO_CHAR(T2.SERVER_RATIO, 'fm9999999990.0000') AS SERVER_RATIO, DECODE(T1.STATUS,'00','草稿','01','待审核','10','正常','11','清算','12','终止','') AS STATUS FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T LEFT JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 ON (T.FD_CHNL_CODE = T1.FD_CHNL_CODE) LEFT JOIN PTEMP.ALL_CHL_RATIO_LIST T2 ON (T.FD_CHNL_CODE = T2.HQ_CHANL_CODE) WHERE T.IS_SIGN = 1 AND T.HQ_CHAN_CODE = #{hq_chan_code} AND T2.DEAL_DATE=#{month}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO PTEMP.ALL_CHL_RATIO_LIST T USING (SELECT * FROM DUAL) T1 ON (T.HQ_CHANL_CODE = #{groupcode} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{month}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.SERVER_RATIO = #{server_ratio}, T.RATIO = #{ratio} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(CHANL_NAME, HQ_CHANL_CODE, SERVER_RATIO, RATIO, GROUP_ID_1,DEAL_DATE) VALUES (#{groupname}, #{groupcode}, #{server_ratio}, #{ratio}, #{group_id_1},#{month})
